Articles.Content: Hi, I\'ve been playing for about a week now and I am absolutely hooked! I look forward to seeing where this game goes and becoming a better kerbonaut (if that\'s spelled right).

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi!

Welcome to the KSP forums! Have fun, enjoy your stay.
